caption.title: Risk assessment of Ae. albopictus-borne chikungunya.
caption.p: In (a), R 0 (black line and grey shade, scale on the left) and p 0 (red lines, scale on the right) are plotted together with n 4, the expected adult vector count per ovitrap from the albopictus model (blue line, scale on the left). In (b), the outbreak risk (red lines, scale on the right) and impact ratio (fraction of total infections, black line and grey shade, scale on the right) are plotted together with n 4 (blue line, scale on the left). Thick and thin lines (or shade) indicate the median and the 95% range.
